select ts.SId, ts.Sname, t.avgscore from te_student ts inner join (select avg(tsc.score) as avgscore, tsc.SId from te_sc tsc group by tsc.SId) t on ts.SId = t.SId
and ts.SId = #{sid}

select ts.SId, ts.Sname, t.avgscore from te_student ts inner join (select avg(tsc.score) as avgscore, tsc.SId from te_sc tsc group by tsc.SId having avgscore >= 60) t on ts.SId = t.SId
and ts.SId = #{sid}

select ts.SId, ts.Sname, t.avgscore from te_student ts inner join (select avg(tsc.score) as avgscore, tsc.SId from te_sc tsc group by tsc.SId having avgscore < 60) t on ts.SId = t.SId
and ts.SId = #{sid}

select a.CId,tc.cname,a.score from ( select tsc1.CId, tsc1.score from (select * from te_sc where CId = '01' order by score desc limit 3) tsc1 union all select tsc2.CId, tsc2.score from (select * from te_sc where CId = '02' order by score desc limit 3) tsc2 union all select tsc3.CId, tsc3.score from (select * from te_sc where CId = '03' order by score desc limit 3) tsc3 ) a left join te_course tc on tc.cid = a.CId
